meanings.definition: The act of serving food and drinks to customers in a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: Waitering requires good memory to remember orders.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant was short-staffed, so the waitering was hectic.
meanings.sent3: The waitering at the new cafe was so efficient that customers were amazed.
meanings.sent4: His waitering was like a well-choreographed dance, smooth and precise.
meanings.sent5: The art of waitering involves balancing plates skillfully.

meanings.definition: The job or profession of being a waiter.
meanings.sent1: His dream was to pursue a career in waitering at a fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent2: Waitering can be demanding but rewarding with good tips.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about his failed attempt at waitering during college.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fine dining, waitering is seen as an art form.
meanings.sent5: She admired the dedication of those who choose waitering as their profession.
